abstract: Chessy Pout, former student at St Paul's School in Concord, NH, who accused classmate Owen Labrie of rape in 2014, speaks about her experience, saying she hopes to support other victims by speaking about difficulties she faced after assault; Labrie, who was convicted of misdemeanor charges for attack, is out on bail pending his appeal.

headline.print_headline: Prep School Assault Victim Tells of Painful Aftermath
headline.main: Victim in New Hampshire Prep School ‘Senior Salute’ Case Speaks Out

snippet: Chessy Prout was 15 when she accused Owen Labrie of rape at St. Paul’s School in Concord, N.H., but he was convicted of lesser charges. She revealed her identity on the “Today” show Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Chessy Prout was 15 when she accused Owen Labrie of rape at St. Paul’s School in Concord, N.H., but he was convicted of lesser charges. She revealed her identity on the “Today” show Tuesday.
